turns.body: It looks like you used the tag !<q> before your message. While this isn't a standard command I'm familiar with, it might be intended to indicate a "quote" or a "question." If you meant to test how I respond to special tags or commands, I'm here to help! Please let me know if you have a specific question or if you'd like to test something else.

I see you've used the tag !<o> before your message. This isn't a standard command I'm programmed to recognize, but it could possibly stand for "output," "option," or something similar. If you're experimenting with different tags or trying to see how I interpret them, feel free to continue! If you have a specific purpose for these tags, let me know, and I'll do my best to adapt to your intended use.
